title.rendered: ETH to spike post halving, ETF denial would not ‘be bearish’

content.rendered: Hashkey Capital’s Jupiter Zheng believes that Ethereum is not priced in on approval of a spot Ethereum ETF yet.

excerpt.rendered: Hashkey Capital’s Jupiter Zheng believes that Ethereum is not priced in on approval of a spot Ethereum ETF yet.
